original_title: Hell Is Where the Party Is
overview: "Hell Is Where The Party Is" has been created with the dynamic young-at-heart MTV-generation in mind, edited in the quick music video style, it pumps up the viewer's Adrenalin, for once, you'll not feel compelled to use the remote control's fast-forward button. The film is a big budget production and the soundtrack consists solely of original music written by well-known mainstream producers. The sex scenes are vigorous and hard and follow each other smoothly. There is a galore of deep throating, anal sex and DP's, starring the world's top porn stars.
title: Hell Is Where the Party Is
